slides.title: Your business is complex. We help you make better choices.
slides.description: Trust and experience are the solution when today's marketplace is riskier and more complex than ever before.

t01Intro.title: Building Trust in Today’s Marketplace
t01Intro.description: UL Connects people to safer, more secure, more sustainable products, services, experiences and environments - enabling smart choices and better lives.

hightlightCard.title: Looking for Standards?
hightlightCard.description: Learn how UL Standards function as a benchmark that enables consumers and businesses to feel confident about the products and services they purchase.

spotlight_1.title: Tailored to your needs
spotlight_1.description: UL helps companies demonstrate safety, confirm compliance, enhance sustainability, manage transparency, deliver quality and performance, strengthen security, protect brand reputation, build workplace excellence, and advance societal wellbeing.
